title: AWESOME Nopa Apt
posting_body: Classic updated spacious one bedroom, one bath unit with private rear deck.
The unit features high 11.3' ceilings and soft wood floors.
There is a large eat in kitchen with granite counters, gas stove and fridge.
Walk to Bi-Rite, Falletti's, Peet's Coffee and Tea, NOPA, the amazing restaurant, Nopalito, Bar Crudo, several local wine bars and so much more!
- Near trendy and fun Divisadero St
- Entertainment: The Independent, and Emporium SF - Arcade

- Food/drink venues just steps from your door: the Mill, Nopa, Little Star Pizza, Souvla, Saffron Grill, Bar Curdo, 4505 Burgers and BBQ, Bean Bag Cafe, Horsefeather, Wine Kitchen, Bi-Rite Market, Mojo bicycle cafe, etc.
- Verifiable income = or greater than 3x the rent
